chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro is experiencing the issue above.

Thank you for your help,

Once the package is received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer has met all of the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Confirms that all personal data has been deleted.
✔ Has confirmed that they have the return label.
✔ Understands that they must include accessories as well as proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Aicha Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
KW
